pages.text: $(li)Mooshrooms are an special variant of the common Cows that can be found in the Mushroom Fields Shore of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They may drop Leather and Raw Beef on death.$(br)$(li)They can't be tamed, but they can be breed and Milked in the same way as Cows.
You can right click on a Mooshroom while you are holding Shears in you hand to transform it into a normal Cow.
